summary: Hi it is my first mod sorry but there are no pictures or videos. she is a simple follower programmed with daedric gear. If you want more please tell me. i can make more eg. vendors, quest, normal npc, and spells thanks.
descriptionHtml:
Hi it is my first mod sorry but there are no videos. she is a simple follower programmed with daedric gear. If you want more please tell me. i can make more eg. vendors, quest, normal npc, and spells thanks.
<br /><br /><br />fully compatible with ufo- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/? 
<br /><br /><br />any questions ask.
author: Jonny Potts
